mapper.select:
select count(*) from t_poorder a LEFT JOIN t_poorderentry b on a.fid = b.mid LEFT JOIN t_supplier c on a.suppId = c.fid LEFT JOIN t_settlement_method d on a.settId = d.fid LEFT JOIN t_department e on a.depaId = e.fid LEFT JOIN icstockbillentry i on b.mid = i.sourFid and b.entryId = i.sourEntryId and b.itemId = i.itemId where 1=1
and (a.billNo like '%${cnm}%' or d.name like '%${cnm}%' or c.`name` like '%${cnm}%' or b.itemName like '%${cnm}%' or b.itemCode like '%${cnm}%' or b.itemModel like '%${cnm}%')
and b.qty-IfNULL(i.qty,0) > 0
and b.qty-i.qty<=0

select count(*) from t_poorder a LEFT JOIN t_poorderentry b on a.fid = b.mid LEFT JOIN t_supplier c on a.suppId = c.fid LEFT JOIN t_settlement_method d on a.settId = d.fid LEFT JOIN t_department e on a.depaId = e.fid
where (a.billNo like '%${str}%' or c.`name` like '%${str}%' or b.itemCode like '%${str}%' or b.itemModel like '%${str}%')
mapper.delete: delete a,b from t_poorder a INNER JOIN t_poorderentry b on a.fid = b.mid where a.fid = #{fid}
